summary: In San Francisco, a psychopathic gangster and his mentor retrieve heroin packages carried by unsuspecting travelers.
cast: Eli Wallach|Robert Keith|Richard Jaeckel|Mary LaRoche|William Leslie|Emile Meyer|Marshall Reed|Raymond Bailey|Vaughn Taylor|Cheryl Callaway|Robert Bailey|Warner Anderson|Jack Carol|Chuck Courtney|Dick Crockett|Francis De Sales|George Eldredge|Kay English|Bobby Gilbert|Bert Holland|Paul Kruger|Mike Lally|William Marsh|Junius Matthews|John Maxwell|Al Merin|Charles Morton|Jack Moyles|Forbes Murray|Kathleen O'Malley|Dee Pollock|Clayton Post|Billy Snyder|Cap Somers|Charles Stewart|Frank Tang|Guy Way
title: Contrabando
